about_the_game:
In the game, three moves such as attack, dash, and skill are used to create advanced effects such as multi-stage damage, teleportation, interruption, and buff. Familiar with skills, you can even suppress the boss until she has no power to fight back. Match skills and experience super cool fast-paced free combat.

Players can match a variety of weapon skills

Each weapon has its own attack characteristics, and you can replace the skills of your favorite weapon at the merchant to create a different combat experience

Player equipment comes with a wealth of entries

Each piece of equipment will randomly have 1~5 entries according to the level of the item, and the entries contain buffs and debuffs, not necessarily the higher the grade, the better

Each time the player dies, a random hat is given

Each hat has a variety of unique battle entries attached to the hat at random, so that each death is a different experience

Completely random goblin

At the end of each level, there will be a big goblin, the whole body is equipped randomly, so that the appearance looks different every time, and the most important thing is that the weapon in his hand is also randomly generated, and it must be dropped after death, and the player can use the boss's weapon to fight.

Random levels

Each time the player enters a level, they will randomly select one from the level library to play to minimize repetition.

Inflicts various statuses on enemies

Freezing, combustion, electric shock, etc., can interact as melting, conduction, explosion, etc.

Lead the defeated bosses to fight together and defend against the enemy together

Disclaimer: This game is completed by the author alone, the translation and dubbing are converted by the translation software, the author does not understand and can not understand, if there is any error, please understand.
